definition: (of a plant) having a lush and unchecked growth
details:
adjective
- (of a plant) having a lush and unchecked growth
= example: (of a plant) having a lush and unchecked growth
- unrestrained and violent
= example: unrestrained and violent
- rearing on left hind leg with forelegs elevated and head usually in profile
= synonyms: rearing
